__e: That's better, but you must hit a lot harder.
I think they can't hit us any harder than they already are, colonel.
No, you'd rather work for my greatest enemy and then, just when I think the knife can't twist any farther you take over his entire company.
My life is harder than you think.
Don't let it make you think you're tougher than you are.
I have thicker skin than you can even imagine.
You see, it's been hard on me too, harder than I thought.
This is tougher than I thought, but it is so good to hear from you.
Just being the "it couple"- it's so much harder than I thought.
Still. Trust me. The one thing worse than seeing Dad once a year was seeing him all year.
Trust me, I know you don't have any reason to believe in me, but I work harder than anyone else.
Just being the "it couple"- it's so much harder than I thought.
Then do something to toughen up that boy!
I will try to make it harder for you to let me win.
But maybe you should've tried to ask him these questions a little harder.
And she's begging me to go harder and harder.
All you got to do is work a little harder, Aaron. Pretty soon, you'll be company front man.
I can promise you that we will work even harder now because I am angry... and this should make you angry, too.
I'm going to work even harder as a chef for us now.
You all have worked harder and longer for this business than anyone could ask.
She tells me she wants it harder or faster.
And with everything that's happened it's been harder and harder to remember the past.
